a.title:
The meeting can be viewed online here: https://www.reyn.org/Members.aspx
 
To request an opportunity to address the Board of Education during the April BOE Meeting, please click here and fill out a Visitor Request Form:  

https://bit.ly/2RJO1s3

Location: Virtual Meeting Starting at: 6:30 PM

The Finance Committee will meet on Wednesday, April 29th, 5:00 p.m. at the Reynoldsburg City Schools Central Office, 7244 East Main St.

Anyone wishing to attend the meeting is asked to notify Judy Eck no later than 12:00 p.m. at Jeck@reyn.org or 614-501-1017 on 4/29/20 so that the District can ensure proper social distancing and safety.

Location: 7244 E. Main Street Starting at: 5:00 PM
Location: Cafeteria Starting at: 6:00 PM Ending at: 7:00 PM
Starting at: 2:45 PM Ending at: 4:00 PM
